description:
This signal detects events that could be describing IPSEC NAT Traversal traffic.
IPSEC is a VPN technology that allows one system to talk to another using
encrypted tunnels. NAT Traversal enables these tunnels to communicate over
the Internet where one of the sides is behind a NAT router gateway. This may
be common on your network, but this technique is also used by threat actors
to avoid detection.
name: IPSEC NAT Traversal Port Activity
